ARGUMENT
v

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lshplss.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lshplss.h | |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lshplss.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 4 |  | lshplss.u | |- ( ph -> U e. H ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSpan ` W ) = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 7 | 5, 6, 1, 2 | #P_islshp | |- ( W e. LMod -> ( U e. H <-> ( U e. S /\ U =/= ( Base ` W ) /\ E. v e. ( Base ` W ) ( ( LSpan ` W ) ` ( U u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( U e. H <-> ( U e. S /\ U =/= ( Base ` W ) /\ E. v e. ( Base ` W ) ( ( LSpan ` W ) ` ( U u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( U e. S /\ U =/= ( Base ` W ) /\ E. v e. ( Base ` W ) ( ( LSpan ` W ) ` ( U u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` W ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simp1d | |- ( ph -> U e. S ) |
